name: Crushing Sky
description:
1-4 change tools

1- fist - punch trees to get wood
2 - watering can - used to water the trees
3 - bucket - used to gather water from rain
4 - shotgun - shoot the cloud to make rain, uses acorns as ammo.
 Acorns have chance to drop from fully grown trees

Sky is getting smaller, make baloons at workbench  to slow down the process, each baloon needs 5 wood.
